      • questionIDToString

        public static java.lang.String questionIDToString(int qid,
                                                  int fid)
        this is a static method that can be used by anyone who need to convert question id ints to a String
        Parameters:
        qid - - question id
        fid - - field id
        Returns:
        a String that looks like a full questionID. for example questionid=1 and fieldid=2 will return 02001

      • parseID

        public static int[] parseID(java.lang.String id)
        this function is static and can be used anywhere all you need is to send a full question ID (like 02001)
        Parameters:
        id - - String of QuestionID (like 04002)
        Returns:
        an array of ints where index [0]=fieldid and [1]=questionid
